metadata.title: CVE-2024-35943 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:pmdomain: ti: Add a null pointer check to the omap_prm_domain_initdevm_kasprintf() returns a pointer to dynamically allocated memory whichcan be NULL upon failure. Ensure the allocation was successful by checkingthe pointer validity.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
